title: Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 5000 m 1948","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":"32.","37":"33.","38":"34.","39":"35.","40":"36.","41":"37.","42":"38.","43":"39.","44":null,"45":null,"46":null,"47":"Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 5000 m competition was held at the Kulm Rink, Badrutts Park and 40 athletes participated in the event.","48":null,"49":"These results for Men's 5000 m - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","50":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 5000 m 1948","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Reidar Liaklev","6":"Odd Lundberg","7":"G\u00f6the Hedlund","8":"Gustav Jansson","9":"Jan Langedijk","10":"Cornelis Broekman","11":"\u00c5ke Seyffarth","12":"Pentti Lammio","13":"Lauri Parkkinen","14":"Kornel Pajor","15":"John Cronshey","16":"Anton Huiskes","17":"Ivan Ruttkay","18":"Craig MacKay","19":"Veikko Kalevi Laitinen","20":"Rune Hammerstr\u00f6m","21":"Ray Blum","22":"Kenneth Henry","23":"Henry Howes","24":"Adrianus de Koning","25":"Louis Rupprecht","26":"Vladimir Kolar","27":"Henry Hebbe","28":"Max Stiepl","29":"Lee Hiyo-chang","30":"Antero Ojala","31":"Richard Solem","32":"Thomas Ross","33":"Akos Elekfy","34":"Pierre Huylebroeck","35":"Guido Caroli","36":"Dennis Blundell","37":"Heinz H\u00fcgelshofer","38":"Josef Rogger","39":"Gedeon Ladanyi","40":"Enrico Musolino","41":"Fernando Alloni","42":"Lee Chang-kook","43":"Alfred Altenburger","44":"Charles Mathiesen","45":null,"46":null,"47":"Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1948 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
